attributes.action: Assume Gift Aid on all Charitable Donations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gift Aid helps charities to maximise a donation from an individual with 28% added by the treasury. Its brilliant and a fabulous extra to fundraising. However the administration of gaining Gift Aid declarations from donors, many of whom do not fully understand the system and the administration of the claims takes a huge ammount of time and resources for organisations.

Therefore in these troubled financial times it would be fantastic if the Chancellor allowed all charities to assume Gift Aid unless someone actively opts out of the system. This would boost charitable income and release resources across the UK.

Please Mr. Darling allow charities to assume Gift Aid?
